title: Interview with Dr. Sam Friedman
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Sam Friedman from LSE about his book 'The Class Ceiling: Why it pays to be privileged'. Sam explains his research into social mobility, the closed nature of certain professions and the myth of meritocracy.
